namedStyles.description: The name property of the Style in namedStyles. The name cannot be null, undefined, or ''; it must be set a value.

NameInfo.title: NameInfo
NameInfo.description: Represents a custom named expression that can be used by formulas.

Style.title: Style
Style.description: Represents the style for a cell, row, or column.

BaseCellType.title: BaseCellType
BaseCellType.description: Represents the base class for the other cell type classes.

typeName.description: The value is a fixed value '0'.

CornerCellType.title: CornerCellType
CornerCellType.description: Represents the painter of the corner cell.

typeName.description: The value is a fixed value '4'.

RowHeaderCellType.title: RowHeaderCellType
RowHeaderCellType.description: Represents the painter of the row header cells.

typeName.description: The value is a fixed value '3'.

ColumnHeaderCellType.title: ColumnHeaderCellType
ColumnHeaderCellType.description: Represents the painter of the column header cells.

typeName.description: The value is a fixed value '2'.
The value is a fixed value '1'.
The value is a fixed value '6'.
The value is a fixed value '5'.

ComboBoxCellType.title: ComboBoxCellType
ComboBoxCellType.description: Represents an ordinary combo box cell.

typeName.description: The value is a fixed value '7'.
The value is a fixed value '8'.

CheckBoxAlign.title: CheckBoxAlign
CheckBoxAlign.description: Specifies the text alignment for check box cells. top:0, bottom:1, left:2, right:3.

EditorValueType.title: EditorValueType
EditorValueType.description: Specifies what is written out to the data model for a selected item from certain cell types that offer a selection of multiple values. text:0, index:1, value:2.

HyperLinkTargetType.title: HyperLinkTargetType
HyperLinkTargetType.description: Specifies the hyperlink's target type. blank:0, self:1, parent:2, top:3.

GeneralFormatter.title: GeneralFormatter
GeneralFormatter.description: Represents a formatter with the specified format mode and format string.

CustomFormatter.title: CustomFormatter
CustomFormatter.description: Represents a custom formatter with the specified format string.

HorizontalAlign.title: HorizontalAlign
HorizontalAlign.description: Indicates the horizontal alignment. left:0, center:1, right:2, general:3.

VerticalAlign.title: VerticalAlign
VerticalAlign.description: Indicates the vertical alignment. top:0, center:1, bottom:2.

ErrorStyle.title: ErrorStyle
ErrorStyle.description: Indicates the data validation error style. stop:0, warning:1, information:2.

CriteriaType.title: CriteriaType
CriteriaType.description: Indicates the data validator criteria type. anyValue:0, wholeNumber:1, decimalValues:2,list:3,date:4,time:5,textLength:6,custom:7.

RelationCondition.title: RelationCondition
RelationCondition.description: Represents a relation condition with a specified relation type.

NumberCondition.title: NumberCondition
NumberCondition.description: Represents a number condition of the specified type with the specified expected value.

TextCondition.title: TextCondition
TextCondition.description: Represents a text condition with the specified text comparison type based on the specified cell.

ColorCondition.title: ColorCondition
ColorCondition.description: Represents a style condition with the specified comparison type and expected color.

FormulaCondition.title: FormulaCondition
FormulaCondition.description: Represents a custom condition with a specified formula or expression.

DateCondition.title: DateCondition
DateCondition.description: Represents a date condition with the specified comparison type, expected date condition, and formula.

DateExCondition.title: DateExCondition
DateExCondition.description: Represents a date condition with the specified comparison type, expected date condition, and formula.

TextLengthCondition.title: TextLengthCondition
TextLengthCondition.description: Represents a text length condition with the specified comparison type, expected number, and formula.

Top10Condition.title: Top10Condition
Top10Condition.description: Represents a top 10 condition with the specified type and rank, for the specified cell ranges.

UniqueCondition.title: UniqueCondition
UniqueCondition.description: Represents a unique condition and sets whether to check for duplicate data.

AverageCondition.title: AverageCondition
AverageCondition.description: Represents a new average condition of the specified type for the specified cell ranges.

CellValueCondition.title: CellValueCondition
CellValueCondition.description: Represents a cell value condition with a specified compare type, expected value, and formula.

AreaCondition.title: AreaCondition
AreaCondition.description: Represents an area condition using the expected source or formula.

GeneralComparisonOperators.title: GeneralComparisonOperators
GeneralComparisonOperators.description: Specifies the general operator. equalsTo:0, notEqualsTo:1, greaterThan:2, greaterThanOrEqualsTo:3, lessThan:4, lessThanOrEqualsTo:5.

LogicalOperators.title: LogicalOperators
LogicalOperators.description: Specifies the relation operator. or:0, and:1.

ComparisonOperator.title: ComparisonOperator
ComparisonOperator.description: Specifies the comparison operator. equalsTo:0, notEqualsTo:1, greaterThan:2, greaterThanOrEqualsTo:3, lessThan:4, lessThanOrEqualsTo:5, between:6, notBetween:7.

TextComparisonOperator.title: TextComparisonOperator
TextComparisonOperator.description: Specifies the text comparison operator. contains:0, doesNotContain:1, beginsWith:2, endsWith:3.

ColorCompareType.title: ColorCompareType
ColorCompareType.description: Specifies the color compare type. backgroundColor:0, foregroundColor:1.

CustomValueType.title: CustomValueType
CustomValueType.description: Specifies the custom value type. empty:0, nonEmpty:1, error:2, nonError:3, formula:4.

DateCompareType.title: DateCompareType
DateCompareType.description: Specifies the date compare type. equalsTo:0, notEqualsTo:1, before:2, beforeEqualsTo:3, after:4, afterEqualsTo:5.

DateOccurringType.title: DateOccurringType
DateOccurringType.description: Specifies the date occurring type. today:0, yesterday:1, tomorrow:2, last7Days:3, thisMonth:4, lastMonth:5, nextMonth:6, thisWeek:7, lastWeek:8, nextWeek:9.

Top10ConditionType.title: Top10ConditionType
Top10ConditionType.description: Specifies the top 10 condition type. top:0, bottom:1.

AverageConditionType.title: AverageConditionType
AverageConditionType.description: Specifies the average condition type. above:0, below:1, equalOrAbove:2, equalOrBelow:3, above1StdDev:4, below1StdDev:5, above2StdDev:6, below2StdDev:7, above3StdDev:8, below3StdDev:9.

CellValueRule.title: CellValueRule
CellValueRule.description: Represents a cell value conditional rule.

SpecificTextRule.title: SpecificTextRule
SpecificTextRule.description: Represents a specific text rule based on the specified cell.

FormulaRule.title: FormulaRule
FormulaRule.description: Represents a formula rule with the specified formula and style.

DateOccurringRule.title: DateOccurringRule
DateOccurringRule.description: Represents a DateOccurringRule with the specified type and style.

Top10Rule.title: Top10Rule
Top10Rule.description: Represents a formula rule with the specified formula and style.

TwoScaleRule.title: TwoScaleRule
TwoScaleRule.description: Represents a two-color conditional scale rule with the specified parameters.

ThreeScaleRule.title: ThreeScaleRule
ThreeScaleRule.description: Represents a three-color scale conditional rule with the specified parameters.

DataBarRule.title: DataBarRule
DataBarRule.description: Represents a data bar conditional rule with the specified parameters.

IconSetRule.title: IconSetRule
IconSetRule.description: Represents an icon set rule with the specified parameters.

IconCriterion.title: IconCriterion
IconCriterion.description: Represents an icon criteria with the specified parameters.

IconValueType.title: IconValueType
IconValueType.description: Indicates whether to return a specified number directly. number:1, percent:4, percentile:5, formula:7.

ScaleValueType.title: ScaleValueType
ScaleValueType.description: Specifies the scale value type. number:0, lowestValue:1, highestValue:2, percent:3, percentile:4, automin:5, formula:6, automax:7.

BarDirection.title: BarDirection
BarDirection.description: Specifies the data bar direction. leftToRight:0, rightToLeft:1.

DataBarAxisPosition.title: DataBarAxisPosition
DataBarAxisPosition.description: Specifies the position of the data bar's axis. automatic:0, cellMidPoint:1, none:2.

IconSetType.title: IconSetType
IconSetType.description: Specifies the icon set. threeArrowsColored:0, threeArrowGray:1, threeTriangles:2, threeStars:3, threeFlags:4, threeTrafficLightsUnrimmed:5, threeTrafficLightsRimmed:6, threeSigns:7, threeSymbolsCircled:8, threeSymbolsUncircled:9, fourArrowsColored:10, fourArrowGray:11, fourRedToBlack:12, fourRatings:13, fourTrafficLights:14, fiveArrowsColored:15, fiveArrowsGray:16, fiveRatings:17, fiveQuarters:18, fiveBoxes:19.

RegExp.title: RegExp
RegExp.description: A built-in JavaScript object, represents a RegExp

LineBorder.title: LineBorder
LineBorder.description: Indicates the color of the border line. Use a known color name or HEX style color value. The default value is black.

LineStyle.title: LineStyle
LineStyle.description: Specifies the line drawing style for the border. empty:0, thin:1, medium:2, dashed:3, dotted:4, thick:5, double:6, hair:7, mediumDashed:8, dashDot:9, mediumDashDot:10, dashDotDot:11, mediumDashDotDot:12, slantedDashDot:13.

TextDecorationType.title: TextDecorationType
TextDecorationType.description: Defines the type of the text decoration. none:0, underline:1, lineThrough:2, overline:4.

ImeMode.title: ImeMode
ImeMode.description: Defines the IME mode to control the state of the Input Method Editor (IME). disabled:0, auto:1, active:2, inactive:4.

ReferenceStyle.title: ReferenceStyle
ReferenceStyle.description: Specifies the formula reference style. a1:0, r1c1:1.

AutoFillType.title: AutoFillType
AutoFillType.description: Represents the type of drag fill. copyCells:0, fillSeries:1, fillFormattingOnly:2, fillWithoutFormatting:3, flearValues:4, auto:5.

AutoFitType.title: AutoFitType
AutoFitType.description: Represents whether the component autofits cells or headers. cell:0, cellWithHeader:1.

ShowScrollTip.title: ShowScrollTip
ShowScrollTip.description: Specifies how the scroll tip is displayed. none:0, horizontal:1, vertical:2, both:3

ShowResizeTip.title: ShowResizeTip
ShowResizeTip.description: Defines how the resize tip is displayed. none:0, column:1, row:2, both:3

ImageLayout.title: ImageLayout
ImageLayout.description: Defines the background image layout. stretch:0, center:1, zoom:2, none:3.

namedStyles.description: The name property of the Style in namedStyles cannot be null, undefined, or ''; it must be set to a value.

SelectionModel.title: SelectionModel
SelectionModel.description: Represent a data model for cell selection.

SelectionPolicy.title: SelectionPolicy
SelectionPolicy.description: Specifies how users can select items in the control. single:0, range:1, multiRange:2.

SelectionUnit.title: SelectionUnit
SelectionUnit.description: Specifies the smallest unit users or the application can select. cell:0, row:1, column:2.

SheetModel.title: SheetModel
SheetModel.description: Represents a data model for the worksheet.

SpreadTheme.title: SpreadTheme
SpreadTheme.description: Represents an expression with a named variable as the expression.

Color.title: Color
Color.description: Represents an argb(alpha,red, green, blue) color.

Function.title: Function
Function.description: Represents an abstract base class for defining functions.

Range.title: Range
Range.description: Represents a range, which is described by the row index, column index, row count, and column count.

RowFilterBase.title: RowFilterBase
RowFilterBase.description: Represents a row filter base that supports row filters for filtering rows in a sheet.

[0-9]+.description: The property name is the column's index that is relative to the sheet.
The property name is the column index that is relative to the sheet.
The property name is the column index that is relative to the table.

SparklineType.title: SparklineType
SparklineType.description: Represents the sparkline type. line:0, column:1, winloss:2.

SparklineAxisMinMax.title: SparklineAxisMinMax
SparklineAxisMinMax.description: An enumeration that specifies information about how the vertical axis minimum or maximum is computed for this sparkline group. individual:0, group:1, custom:2.

EmptyValueStyle.title: EmptyValueStyle
EmptyValueStyle.description: Specifies how to show an empty value from a data series in the chart. gaps:0, zero:1, connect:2.

DataOrientation.title: DataOrientation
DataOrientation.description: Represents the orientation of the range. vertical:0, horizontal:1.

Point.title: Point
Point.description: Represents an x and y coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.

CommentState.title: CommentState
CommentState.description: Defines the comment state. active:1, edit:2, normal:3

DisplayMode.title: DisplayMode
DisplayMode.description: Defines when the comment is displayed. alwaysShown:1, hoverShown:2.

SheetTable.title: SheetTable
SheetTable.description: Represents a table that can be added in a sheet.

BuildInTableTheme.title: BuildInTableTheme
BuildInTableTheme.description: Represents a built-in table style setting.

CustomTableTheme.title: CustomTableTheme
CustomTableTheme.description: Represents a custom table style setting.

SpanModel.title: SpanModel
SpanModel.description: Represents a data model for cell spans.

HeaderAutoText.title: HeaderAutoText
HeaderAutoText.description: Specifies which default labels are displayed in headers. blank:0, numbers:1, letters:2.

ClipboardPasteOptions.title: ClipboardPasteOptions
ClipboardPasteOptions.description: Specifies what data is pasted from the Clipboard. all:0, values:1, formatting:2, formulas:3.

ProtectionOption.title: ProtectionOption
ProtectionOption.description: Specifies the elements that you want users to be able to change.

Outline.title: Outline
Outline.description: Represents an outline for the worksheet.

OutlineDirection.title: OutlineDirection
OutlineDirection.description: Specifies the status of an outline summary row or column position. backward:0, forward:1.

SparklineEx.title: SparklineEx
SparklineEx.description: Represents the base class for the other SparklineEx classes.

ResizeZeroIndicator.title: ResizeZeroIndicator
ResizeZeroIndicator.description: Specifies the drawing policy of the row or column when it is resized to zero. default:0, enhanced:1.

PrintInfo.title: PrintInfo
PrintInfo.description: Represents the information to use when printing a sheet.

PrintVisibilityType.title: PrintVisibilityType
PrintVisibilityType.description: Specifies whether the area is visible. inherit:0, hide:1, show:2, showOnce:3

PrintCentering.title: PrintCentering
PrintCentering.description: Specifies the type of centering for the printed page. none:0, horizontal:1, vertical:2, both:3

PrintPageOrientation.title: PrintPageOrientation
PrintPageOrientation.description: Specifies the page orientation used for printing. portrait:1, landscape:2

PrintPageOrder.title: PrintPageOrder
PrintPageOrder.description: Specifies the order in which pages are printed. auto:0, downThenOver:1, overThenDown:2

PaperKind.description: Specifies the paper kind for the printed page. 0 : custom, 1 : letter, 2 : letterSmall, 3 : tabloid, 4 : ledger, 5 : legal, 6 : statement, 7 : executive, 8 : a3, 9 : a4, 10 : PrintMargins.title: PrintMargins
PrintMargins.description: Specifies the dimensions of the printed page margins.

SortState.title: SortState
SortState.description: Specifies the type of sorting to perform. none:0, ascending:1, descending:2.
